doctor.name: Dr. Md. Rafiqul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Rafiqul Islam is a Neurosurgeon in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurosurgery at National Institute of Neurosciences & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Rafiqul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 6pm to 8pm (Only Friday).
